description._content: Printed advertisement for a production of Holiday Ahoy in Deseronto, Ontario. Part of the Floyd Marlin collection. Cast members "under the personal direction of Ivah O'Hara" include: Frances Walker, James D. McVicker, Albert Fraser, Charles Knight, Don Hubble, Dorothy McCullough, Reg. McKee, Nora Edwards, Blanche Detlor and Sharon Burley. Chorus members were: Ethel Brown, Lena Burley, Vera Dawson, Barbara Armitage, Joyce VanVlack, Daphne Hicks, Peggy Dimmel, Herb Aylesworth, Vic Brant, Jack Edwards, Vernon Clarke, A. Twigg, Gordon Burley, Floyd Marlin, Charles Cole, Don Kimmett, Edward Harvey, Tom Jackson, R. Hawthorne, James McVicker, Jr., Lynn Bender, Dorothy Crabbe, Elaine Gardiner, Leona Valiquette, Helen Crispie, Margaret German, Alarina Spicer, June Gordanier, Sally Marland, Dolores Dorey, Ann Gartland, Diane Pritchard, Alberta Marks, Coral Fraser, Barbara Miller, Shirley Brooks, Susan Kendall, Norma McKay, Dawn Smith, Madelyn Waters, Phyllis Bender, Gail Hicks, Marie Hagerman, Marilyn Herrington, Marilyn Hines, Carol Hodges, Marie Dorey. The production was to be held on 11-12 November. The year is not given, but four possibilities arise (given the days of the week and the fact that the jeweller, Gerald Lott was born in 1919): 1949, 1955, 1960 and 1966. There were other productions of this show around the world in 1955, so perhaps this year is the most likely. Thanks to our commenter for confirming that it was indeed performed in 1955.
